title: Large
description: Christmas Square Bites Box invites you to explore different origins from the Manufacture. These small squares, featuring our signature bevelled shapes, allow you to discover the flavours and refinement of our terroirs. Enjoy them on your own, paired with a coffee, or taste them blind with fellow connoisseurs.

title: Large
description: Grande nouveauté cette année : la Manufacture célèbre l’arrivée des marrons glacés au sein de sa collection de fêtes ! Le secret de ces petits nouveaux pour s’intégrer ? Ils ont été confits non seulement dans du sirop de vanille selon la recette traditionnelle, mais également dans du sirop de cacao. Ainsi infusés, ils offrent une saveur inédite, aux notes puissantes et gourmandes.

title: Cracker surprise 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Cette année, pour la première fois, la Manufacture revisite la tradition des crackers de Noël. Ornée d’un Casse-Noisette intrépide, notre papillote généreuse dissimule plusieurs surprises chocolatées. Ouvrez-la en tirant sur les deux côtés afin de découvrir ce qu’elle renferme : deux petits sapins, l’un en chocolat noir et l’autre en chocolat au lait, un sapin au praliné noisette, et trois petits oursons offrant une également double texture, guimauve vanille et praliné noisette.

title: Christmas Spread Hazelnut praliné
description: Non, vous ne rêvez pas, nous proposons désormais notre célèbre praliné noisette en pâte à tartiner ! Nous vous imaginons déjà, petits et grands, munis de vos cuillères, prêts à savourer un peu de cette magie de Noël délicieusement régressive, et ce, sans tourner autour du pot. Comme les pralinés à l’ancienne de la Manufacture qui garnissent plusieurs de nos créations, le praliné noisette à tartiner offre cette texture légèrement granuleuse qui a un goût de reviens-y, et plutôt dix fois qu’une.

title: Roi Souris 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate Praliné noisette
description: Le Roi des Souris vient orner vos tables de fête. Véritable prouesse artisanale par ses détails, cette irrésistible création, dotée d’une généreuse couche de praliné noisette, enchantera vos papilles dès la première bouchée. Une création d’exception, en chocolat noir d’un côté et lait de l’autre, à déposer sur vos tables de fête pour émerveiller vos convives, petits et grands !

title: Large
description: Les Truffes sont enrobées de chocolat puis saupoudrées de poudre de cacao. Leur forme est volontairement irrégulière et leur texture délicieusement fondante.

title: Large
description: The truffles are coated in chocolate and dusted with cocoa powder. Their shape is intentionally irregular, and their texture is irresistibly smooth and melt-in-your-mouth. Decadently indulgent, our truffles come in a variety of gift boxes. Choose from Origin Truffles (dark chocolate ganache), Assorted Truffles (dark chocolate ganache, chestnut cream, and vanilla ganache), or Whisky Truffles (whisky ganache).

title: Large
description: The truffles are coated in chocolate and dusted with cocoa powder. Their shape is intentionally irregular, and their texture is irresistibly smooth and melt-in-your-mouth. Decadently indulgent, our truffles come in a variety of gift boxes. Choose from Origin Truffles (dark chocolate ganache), Assorted Truffles (dark chocolate ganache, chestnut cream, and vanilla ganache), or Whisky Truffles (whisky ganache).

title: Truffles 75% Dark Chocolate
description: The truffles are coated in chocolate and dusted with cocoa powder. Their shape is intentionally irregular, and their texture is irresistibly smooth and melt-in-your-mouth. Decadently indulgent, our truffles come in a variety of gift boxes. Choose from Origin Truffles (dark chocolate ganache), Assorted Truffles (dark chocolate ganache, chestnut cream, and vanilla ganache), or Whisky Truffles (whisky ganache).

title: Large
description: The truffles are coated in chocolate and dusted with cocoa powder. Their shape is intentionally irregular, and their texture is irresistibly smooth and melt-in-your-mouth. Decadently indulgent, our truffles come in a variety of gift boxes. Choose from Origin Truffles (dark chocolate ganache), Assorted Truffles (dark chocolate ganache, chestnut cream, and vanilla ganache), or Whisky Truffles (whisky ganache).

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A stylised Santa Claus adorns the hexagon of the Manufacture for the first time, available in 75% dark chocolate. Behind his faceted beard and hat, he holds a delicious praline filled with gingerbread made by the Biscuit Manufacture, featuring citrus peel, chestnut honey, and star anise. He will leave you enchanted!

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A stylised Santa Claus adorns the hexagon of the Manufacture for the first time, available in 45% milk chocolate. Behind his faceted beard and hat, he holds a delicious praline filled with gingerbread made by the Biscuit Manufacture, featuring citrus peel, chestnut honey, and star anise. He will leave you enchanted!

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Avec ses lignes graphiques et épurées, le sujet le plus discret de notre ballet de Noël est tout de même roi des forêts. En chocolat au lait Madagascar 45%, notre petit sapin n’a pas besoin de guirlandes pour vous enchanter !

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: It seems that our Nutcracker is not only fearless but also irresistible. To be sure, you only need to take a bite! We wouldn’t be surprised if you fall under the spell of its delicious praline aroma. Yes, you guessed it — this elegant piece, made from 45% Madagascar milk chocolate and sculpted like a cameo, hides within its heart our irresistible traditional hazelnut praline, accompanied by a caramel glazed with hazelnut milk and whole hazelnuts. How could anyone resist?

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Avec ses lignes graphiques et épurées, le sujet le plus discret de notre ballet de Noël est tout de même roi des forêts. En chocolat noir Assemblage Signature 75%, notre petit sapin n’a pas besoin de guirlandes pour vous enchanter !

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: It seems that our Nutcracker is not only fearless but also irresistible. To be sure, you only need to take a bite! We wouldn’t be surprised if you fall under the spell of its delicious praline aroma. Yes, you guessed it — this elegant piece, made from 75% Signature dark chocolate and sculpted like a cameo, hides within its heart our irresistible traditional hazelnut praline, accompanied by a caramel glazed with hazelnut milk and whole hazelnuts. How could anyone resist?

title: Advent Calendar 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate
description: We’ve imagined this calendar as a theatre where a gourmet ballet unfolds. Follow the Nutcracker, the Mouse King, and the Sugar Plum Fairy as you discover, step by step (whether it’s a leap or a glide), the hidden chocolate - and hazelnut - treasures behind the scenes. More generous than ever, our calendar is full of surprises, including exclusive recipes which will make these 24 days feel like a delightful journey!

title: Coffret de Noël 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate 30 pièces
description: Entrez dans l’effervescence de la Manufacture pour les fêtes de Noël... Pour ce coffret, notre chef a spécialement réalisé trente recettes. Chaque bouchée représente une véritable expérience culinaire, alliant harmonieusement la douceur du chocolat à des ingrédients savoureux et surprenants : thé jasmin, safran pâte d’amande, orange, tournesol ... Découvrez le mariage subtil entre le chocolat intense et ces ingrédients, une symphonie de notes complexes et chaleureuses qui éveilleront vos sens

title: Sapin à monter 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Chaque étage de notre sapin à monter est composé de recettes différentes: mendiant noisette, amande ou pistache et chocolat noir ou lait pur origine. Le principe : assemblez, partagez et dégustez-le en famille ou entre amis. Il s’accompagne de gants blancs pour un assemblage tout en délicatesse et un sapin finalisé de 20 centimètres de hauteur. Il s’accompagne de gants blancs pour un montage tout en délicatesse

title: Large
description: Christmas Square Bites Box invites you to explore different origins from the Manufacture. These small squares, featuring our signature bevelled shapes, allow you to discover the flavours and refinement of our terroirs. Enjoy them on your own, paired with a coffee, or taste them blind with fellow connoisseurs.

title: Coffret sapins 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate 6 pieces
description: Nos sapins aux lignes élégantes vous invitent à une balade de Noël en forêt enchantée. Ces six arbres sagement alignés dans leur coffret, en chocolat noir et lait, au léger goût de noisette grâce à la touche secrète de nos artisans chocolatiers, sont des pièces à croquer délicates et gourmandes.

title: Bonbonnière de Noël 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate 26 Praliné Treats
description: Délicatement sculptés sur l’une des plus splendides de nos créations, Casse-Noisette, le Roi des Souris et la Fée Dragée ouvrent le bal de Noël. Ils vous invitent à un voyage au pays des friandises : découvrez sous le couvercle de la Bonbonnière un vrai trésor gourmand. Nos fritures de fêtes aux pralinés amande et noisette vont faire danser vos papilles. Et pour la première fois cette année, notre Bonbonnière est à la fois en chocolat noir et chocolat au lait : plus besoin de choisir, vous pouvez avoir les deux ! Elle s’accompagne de gants blancs pour un montage tout en délicatesse.

title: Large
description: Grande nouveauté cette année : la Manufacture célèbre l’arrivée des marrons glacés au sein de sa collection de fêtes ! Le secret de ces petits nouveaux pour s’intégrer ? Ils ont été confits non seulement dans du sirop de vanille selon la recette traditionnelle, mais également dans du sirop de cacao. Ainsi infusés, ils offrent une saveur inédite, aux notes puissantes et gourmandes.

title: Discovery Box - 45 pieces 45 pieces Discovery Box
description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...

title: Large
description: Our Soveria candied fruits, roc's, and dragées are gathered in one box! This box of Essentials contains milk & dark chocolate roc's, Soveria Candied Oranges, milk chocolate hazelnut dragées, dark chocolate almond dragées.

title: Pépites box - 36 pieces 36 pieces Pépites Box
description: This box contains 36 Pépites - small chocolate bites - exploring 6 flavors. In addition to the unmissable Caramel Hazelnut ones, the Manufacture offers you to discover new recipes. Try the chocolaty intensity of the Cocoa Nibs Pépite, the character of the Kenyan coffee Pépite, the roundness of the Walnut Pépite or the crunchy Buckwheat Pépite.

title: Large
description: Our Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" are produced ‘old fashioned-style’. With 4 additional flavors, the box gets larger for pralinés lovers! To the classic recipes with almond, hazelnut, pistachio, peanut, coconut in dark or milk chocolate... are added sunflower, cocoa nibs, white & black sesame flavors. A combination of tradition & originality!

title: Discovery Box - 21 pieces 21 pieces Discovery Box
description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence... This box of 21 pieces contains 21 flavours.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: This box contains 16 luscious "pépites" - small dark chocolate bites. Inside each of them: our famous "old-style" hazelnut praliné, a small dose of caramel and crunchy crushed hazelnuts. A treasure for praline lovers !

title: Discovery Box - 12 pieces 12 pieces Discovery Box
description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...

title: Discovery Box - 90 pieces 90 pieces Discovery Box
description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...

title: Double-bites Box - 4 pieces 4 pieces Discovery Box
description: The Manufacture declines its delicious ganaches and its old-fashioned pralines in an even more delectable format. Double bites are now available in a small introductory box containing 4 bites/4 flavours.

title: Flavored Ganaches 21 pieces Ganaches Box
description: The Flavored Ganaches come in 11 flavours offering different textures: fondant, crunchy and crispy. Created using fresh fruit or spices, the Flavored Ganaches offer both original and creative blends. This box of 21 pieces contains 11 flavours.

title: Large
description: Our Soveria candied fruits, roc's, and dragées are gathered in one box! This box of Essentials contains milk chocolate roc's, Soveria Candied Oranges and milk chocolate hazelnut dragées.

title: Large
description: The square bites box invites you to discover 3 of our origins : Ecuador 85%, Congo 75% and Milk Peru 45%. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors and finesse of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own, accompanied by a coffee, or discover in a blind test with connoisseurs.

title: Large
description: The square bites box invites you to discover 5 origins. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own with coffee, or to discover as a blind test with friends.Discover these square bites : 85% Ecuador, 75% Congo, 75% Brasil, 55% Milk Madagascar, 45% Milk Peru.

title: Square bites box 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Our box of Square Bites introduces children to the authentic taste of chocolate thanks to cocoa beans sourced from three specific origins: Madagascar, Peru and Cameroon. With this assortment box of jungle animals, little gourmets can discover chocolate craftsmanship, and all it entails, in a fun way. This box is the perfect companion for a delicious snack break !

title: Discovery Box - 30 pieces 30 pieces Discovery Box
description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes... This box of 30 pieces contains 25 flavours.

title: Large
description: Our Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" are produced ‘old fashioned-style’ . These classics, with almonds and hazelnuts caramelised come in fondant and crunchy varieties. Recipes containing pistachios, peanuts or roasted coconut marry tradition and originality. This box of 27 pieces contains 9 flavours.

title: 6 chocolate bars Box 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate
description: From the grand cru to the single-origin bar, not to mention the Mendiant and the unconched Tradition bar, this set of chocolate bars is an invitation to the sweet world of La Manufacture. 6 chocolate bars: 45% Peru Milk, 75% Almonds, Candied Oranges & Figs, 75% Rustic Peru, 85% Ecuador, 75% Mexico, 75% Madagascar Criollo & Trinitario.* *The bars' list may vary from onoe origin to another depending on availibility.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: This box contains 16 luscious "pépites" - small milk chocolate bites. Inside each of them : our famous "old-style" hazelnut praliné, a small dose of caramel and crunchy crushed hazelnuts. A treasure for praline lovers !

title: Flavored Ganaches & Single-Origin Ganaches 54 pieces Ganaches Box
description: A selection of 54 bonbons to discover the Flavored Ganaches and Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches.

title: Flavored Ganaches & Pralinés à l'Ancienne 51 pieces Discovery Box
description: A selection of 51 bonbons to discover the Flavored Ganaches and Pralinés "à l'Ancienne".

title: Cocorico Box 16 Pieces 16 pieces Pépites Box
description: Did you know? In Latin, the word "gallus" means both "Gaul" and "rooster"! Historically, the rooster appeared on Gaulish coins — today, it appears on our treats! In collaboration with the Élysée - Presidency of the Republic brand, Chocolat Alain Ducasse pays tribute to the French symbol and includes the word "Cocorico" inscribed on its pépites. These indulgent treats conceal a dual-praliné heart: hazelnut praline & almond nib praliné for the dark chocolate version, and almond praliné & hazelnut vanilla praliné for the milk chocolate. Proceeds contribute to the funding of the renovation of the Élysée Palace, helping to enhance this historic monument and open it to the French population, 300 years after its construction.

title: Discovery Box - 58 pieces 58 pieces Discovery Box
description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence... This box of 58 pieces contains 25 flavours.

title: Single-Origin Ganaches 30 pieces Ganaches Box
description: The origins of the cocoa are key to discovering the Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches , it is the terroir of each country or, more precisely, of each region that gives the beans their individual taste. The Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches come in 5 varieties, like an invitation to as many gustatory destinations around the world. This box of 30 pieces contains 5 flavours.

title: Single-Origin Ganaches & Pralinés à l'Ancienne 60 pieces Discovery Box
description: A selection of 60 bonbons to discover the Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches and Pralinés "à l'Ancienne".

title: Discovery Box - 45 pieces 45 pieces Discovery Box
description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...

description: This box contains 36 Pépites - small chocolate bites - exploring 6 flavors. In addition to the unmissable Caramel Hazelnut ones, the Manufacture offers you to discover new recipes. Try the chocolaty intensity of the Cocoa Nibs Pépite, the character of the Kenyan coffee Pépite, the roundness of the Walnut Pépite or the crunchy Buckwheat Pépite.

title: Discovery Box - 90 pieces 90 pieces Discovery Box

title: Soveria candied Citrus trio 75% Dark Chocolate
description: It is in Soveria, a small village in Corsica, that craftsmen manufacture oranges, lemons, grapefruit and ginger. After a night's rest they are then individually cut, before being coated with cocoa powder, with the exception of candied ginger.  The final step exalts their natural flavours: a thin coating of dark chocolate... For a very delicious and delectable result.

title: Flavored Ganaches 21 pieces Ganaches Box
description: The Flavored Ganaches come in 11 flavours offering different textures: fondant, crunchy and crispy. Created using fresh fruit or spices, the Flavored Ganaches offer both original and creative blends. This box of 21 pieces contains 11 flavours.

title: The Blend 75% Dark Chocolate Signature Bar
description: The Manufacture invites you to discover its blend, a perfect balance between 4 crus cocoa beans - Peru, Ecuador, Madagascar, Sao Tome - for a unique signature chocolate bar! The Signature chocolate bars are the combination of a taste with a unique identity, discover recipes revealing the raw and pure character of our selected beans.

title: Peru Chuncho 75% Dark Chocolate Tablette Origine
description: The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Large
description: Our Soveria candied fruits, roc's, and dragées are gathered in one box! This box of Essentials contains milk & dark chocolate roc's, Soveria Candied Oranges, milk chocolate hazelnut dragées, dark chocolate almond dragées.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A dark chocolate bar with 75% cocoa covered in whole, caramelised almonds The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: In dark chocolate praline or milk chocolate. Individual bars of chocolate to enjoy on the go or slipped into a piece of bread. This compact and practical box is easily transportable, for an impromptu snack, a picnic, at the office, traveling... 20 individually wrapped bars - 240 g

title: Large
description: Deliciously regressive, spreadable chocolate... Created from an almond and hazelnut praline, dark chocolate and milk chocolate, this spread will put a smile on the faces of children and grown-ups alike. Similarly to the Manufacture’s old-fashioned pralines, the spread has a slightly granulose texture making it unique and ultra- delicious. XL size 550g

title: Discovery Box - 21 pieces 21 pieces Discovery Box
description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence... title: Coffret cadeau découverte 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate
Coconut Praliné 75% Dark Chocolate Filled Bar
description: The coconut praliné from the Manufacture is entering the range of filled bars for the happiness of the most gourmands! This 75% Signature Blend dark chocolate bar is filled with two preparations made by our chocolate craftsmen. First a praliné with roasted coconut and almonds, then a caramel, also with coconut. The crunchiness of the praliné and the smoothness of the caramel combined to the crisp of the chocolate layers create a delicious game of textures, for a great moment of indulgence.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: This box contains 16 luscious "pépites" - small milk chocolate bites. Inside each of them : our famous "old-style" hazelnut praliné, a small dose of caramel and crunchy crushed hazelnuts. A treasure for praline lovers !

The Signature chocolate bars are the combination of a taste with a unique identity, discover recipes revealing the raw and pure character of our selected beans.

title: Rustic Peru 75% Dark Chocolate Signature Bar
description: A bar of dark chocolate made with beans originating from Peru. Not having undergone the conching stage,  making it closer to that of the bean. The Signature chocolate bars are the combination of a taste with a unique identity, discover recipes revealing the raw and pure character of our selected beans.

title: Extra Dark Pure Cocoa Signature Bar
description: A refined and powerful dark chocolate, without added sugar, the pure flavour of cocoa beans originating from Peru, South America. The Signature chocolate bars are the combination of a taste with a unique identity, discover recipes revealing the raw and pure character of our selected beans.

title: Sugar-free 85% Dark Chocolate Signature Bar
description: To indulge without guilt, La Manufacture offers a sugar-free dark chocolate bar with 85% cocoa The Signature chocolate bars are the combination of a taste with a unique identity, discover recipes revealing the raw and pure character of our selected beans.

title: Rustic Madagascar 45% Milk Chocolate Signature Bar
description: A bar of milk chocolate, with beans originating from Madagascar, Indian Ocean. Not having undergone the conching stage,  making it closer to that of the bean. The Signature chocolate bars are the combination of a taste with a unique identity, discover recipes revealing the raw and pure character of our selected beans.

title: Crunchy Bar 45% Milk Chocolate
description: The Manufacture de Chocolat Alain Ducasse is spoiling young gourmets with a new crunchy milk chocolate bar . On this chocolate puzzle, you'll find the emblematic animals from our collection. So which piece will you taste first? You'll find it hard to resist this super crunchy recipe which uses crêpe dentelle wafer bits to give its crispy texture.

title: Coconut Milk 45% Milk Chocolate Signature Bar
description: Discover this brand-new recipe of La Manufacture, 100% vegan and made with coconut milk & Cameroon cocoa beans, a sweet delight!

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A dark chocolate bar with 75% cocoa covered with chopped pistachios The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A dark chocolate bar with 75% cocoa covered in whole, caramelised hazelnuts The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

description: A dark chocolate bar with 75% cocoa covered in whole, caramelised almonds The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A milk chocolate bar covered in whole, caramelised almonds, pistachios, pine nuts, morsels of figs and candied orange The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

description: A milk chocolate bar covered in whole, chopped pistachios The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A bar of dark chocolate encrusted with almond brittle, and a touch of fleur de sel. The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A bar of milk chocolate dotted with almond brittle and seasoned with a salty note from the hint of fleur de sel The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A milk chocolate bar covered in whole, caramelised hazelnuts The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

title: Ecuador National Arriba 85% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: With a 5,000-year-old genetic lineage, Ecuador’s famous heirloom cocoa - Nacional - from the Finca Garyth farm embodies centuries of cocoa tradition. A true single-origin “grand cru”, it is a complex blend of wild tropical flavours, fresh almonds, a vegetal undertone and banana in the finish. The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

title: Madagascar Mivoatra 85% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: Cru d'Exception among our range of chocolate bars, this chocolate from Madagascar presents strong and musky flavours. Raw and acidulous notes emerge during tasting. From the cocoa bean to the chocolate bar, including roasting and conching, all the production stages are carried out in our factory. With a range of different origins, our Cru d'Exception chocolate bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans.

title: Tanzanie 75% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: Cru d'Exception among our range of chocolate bars, this chocolate from Tanzania presents bright and fruity notes. Notes of citrus, acidulous and fresh, emerge during tasting. From the cocoa bean to the chocolate bar, including roasting and conching, all the production stages are carried out in our factory. With a range of different origins, our Cru d'Exception chocolate bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans.

title: Vietnam 75% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: A rugged and slightly acidic dark chocolate, made with beans originating from Vietnam, Asia The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Philippines Trinitario 75% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: Grown in the tropical region of Davao, at Paquibato in Southeastern Philippines, this cocoa is a balanced blend of fruity and sour notes. A true single-origin "grand cru", it gathers the flavors of tropical fruits, berries, citrus and of roasted nuts. The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

title: Peru Chuncho 75% Dark Chocolate Tablette Origine
description: The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Colombie Criollo 75% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: Cru d'Exception from Latin America, this dark chocolate comes from Colombian Criollo beans. With its 75% cocoa, this dark chocolate presents soft and balanced notes. With a palette of different origins, our Cru d'Exception chocolate bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans.

title: Venezuela Chuao 75% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: Grand cru cocoa beans: a delicate dark chocolate of an exceptional variety, beans originating from Chuao, a small village of Venezuela The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Madagascar Criollo & Trinitario 75% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: This rare cocoa from Northwestern Madagascar grows in the canopy of the Ottange farm under the shade of native trees. A true single-origin “grand cru”, this dark chocolate is a subtle bouquet of notes of red fruits, nuts, honey, coffee and cocoa. The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

title: Mexico Criollo & Almendra Blanca 75% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: A true single-origin "grand cru", this chocolate from Mexico - the origin country of cocoa is made from Criollo & Almendra Blanca beans of the Tacotalpa region. Nurtured by the warmth and humidity of the country, they offer an abundance of citrus and tonic notes and reveal a discreet bitterness. The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

title: Sao Tome & Principe Amelonado 75% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: Grand cru cocoa beans: São Tomé cacao originates from the first importations of chocolate in to Africa. This traditional pure product is from an Amelonado variety. Its distinctive features include aromas of dried fruits. The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources.

title: Equateur 60% Milk Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
Togo 60% Milk Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: Delicate and flavored, this grand cru is the first from Togo to be processed by the Manufacture's roasting chocolate craftsmen. Thanks to its high cocoa content, this bar combines the sweetness of milk chocolate with the intensity of cocoa.

title: Madagascar 55% Milk Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: A tart milk chocolate made with beans originating from Madagascar, Indian Ocean. The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Madagascar 45% Milk Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: A tart milk chocolate, traditionally balanced, made with beans originating from Madagascar, Indian Ocean The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Peru 45% Milk Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: A milk chocolate, traditionally balanced, made with beans originating from Peru, South America The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Madagascar Milk Chocolate 35% Grand Cru Bar
description: A very milky and sweet milk chocolate, made with beans originating from Madagascar The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A bar of dark chocolate filled with an old-style hazelnut praliné, with a pinch of fleur de sel to intensify the flavour Filled chocolate bars require patient and meticulous work. The chocolate is first poured in a thin layer. The filling is then delicately placed onto the poured chocolate, which is then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar...

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A bar of milk chocolate filled with a traditional hazelnut praliné and seasoned with a salty note from the hint of fleur de sel. Try it now, it's unmissable! Filled chocolate bars require patient and meticulous work. The chocolate is first poured in a thin layer. The filling is then delicately placed onto the poured chocolate, which is then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar with a praliné, marzipan, ganache or fruit centre for crunchy, crispy or fondant centres.

title: Pistachio-flavoured Marzipan 75% Dark Chocolate Filled Bar
description: A bar of dark chocolate filled with pistachio-flavoured marzipan Filled chocolate bars require patient and meticulous work. The chocolate is first poured in a thin layer. The filling is then delicately placed onto the poured chocolate, which is then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar with a praliné, marzipan, ganache or fruit centre for crunchy, crispy or fondant centres.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Coated in dark chocolate, this chocolate bar is filled with a smooth caramel that melts in the mouth and crunchy almond flakes, a blend of flavours and textures that will awaken your senses. The perfect sweet treat !

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: For the Elysée, we created with Pierre Tachon, the French Hexa. A tribute to France’s shape, it invites you to share the values of the Republic. Coated in milk chocolate, it is garnished with French dried fruts and nuts. All the profits go towards restoration projects of The Elysée, 300 hundred years after it was built, and contribute to the preservation of cultural & historical patrimony.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: For the Elysée, we created with Pierre Tachon, the French Hexa. A tribute to France’s shape, it invites you to share the values of the Republic. Coated in dark chocolate, it is garnished with French dried fruts and nuts. All the profits go towards restoration projects of The Elysée, 300 hundred years after it was built, and contribute to the preservation of cultural & historical patrimony.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse imagined a new patriotic creation following the Hexa-français. Proudly displaying the french nation motto on one side, it pays tribute to the french terroir on the other. Decorated with nuts & candied fruits all from France, its tasting offers a variety of flavors and textures. For the Dark version, the Manufacture selected the Signature Blend 75% for its beautiful aromatic intensity and its slightly fruity notes. All the profits go towards restoration projects of the Elysée Palace, 300 hundred years after it was built, and contribute to the preservation of cultural and historical patrimony. A creation by Pierre Tachon

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse imagined a new patriotic creation following the Hexa-français. Proudly displaying the french nation motto on one side, it pays tribute to the french terroir on the other. Decorated with nuts & candied fruits all from France, its tasting offers a variety of flavors and textures. For the Milk version, the Manufacture selected the Single Origin Madagascar Trinitario 45%, very mild with red fruit notes, slightly tart. All the profits go towards restoration projects of the Elysée Palace, 300 hundred years after it was built, and contribute to the preservation of cultural and historical patrimony. A creation by Pierre Tachon

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: The dark chocolate produced by La Manufacture is available in XXL format! This one kilo breakable block is to be savoured as it comes or to offer as an original present in a novel form. This artisanal chocolate, with its unique flavour, can also be used in the preparation of desserts.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: The dark chocolate produced by La Manufacture is available in XXL format! This one kilo breakable block is to be savoured as it comes or to offer as an original present in a novel form. This artisanal chocolate, with its unique flavour, can also be used in the preparation of desserts.

title: 6 chocolate bars Box 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate
description: From the grand cru to the single-origin bar, not to mention the Mendiant and the unconched Tradition bar, this set of chocolate bars is an invitation to the sweet world of La Manufacture. 6 chocolate bars: 45% Peru Milk, 75% Almonds, Candied Oranges & Figs, 75% Rustic Peru, 85% Ecuador, 75% Mexico, 75% Madagascar Criollo & Trinitario.* *The bars' list may vary from onoe origin to another depending on availibility.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A dark chocolate bar with 75% cocoa covered in whole, caramelised almonds, pistachios, pine nuts, morsels of figs and candied orange The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

title: Bolivia Wild Cocoa 75% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: Harvested by native populations in the northern forest of Bolivia, this wild cocoa reveals a sweet smell and is characterized by a non-acidic freshness and a particularly varied palette of aromas: dried fruits, flowers and spices. The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources.

title: Brazil Forastero Blanco 75% Dark Chocolate Grand Cru Bar
description: Grand cru: « Forastero Blanco », also known as « Catongo », carries red fruit flavours. The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Coconut Praliné 75% Dark Chocolate Filled Bar
description: The coconut praliné from the Manufacture is entering the range of filled bars for the happiness of the most gourmands! This 75% Signature Blend dark chocolate bar is filled with two preparations made by our chocolate craftsmen. First a praliné with roasted coconut and almonds, then a caramel, also with coconut. The crunchiness of the praliné and the smoothness of the caramel combined to the crisp of the chocolate layers create a delicious game of textures, for a great moment of indulgence.

title: Pistachio praliné 75% Dark Chocolate Filled Bar
description: A bar of dark chocolate filled with old-style crunchy praliné with pistachios. Filled chocolate bars require patient and meticulous work. The chocolate is first poured in a thin layer. The filling is then delicately placed onto the poured chocolate, which is then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar with a praliné, marzipan, ganache or fruit centre for crunchy, crispy or fondant centres.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Coated in milk chocolate, this chocolate bar is filled with a smooth caramel that melts in the mouth and crunchy almond flakes, a blend of flavours and textures that will awaken your senses. The perfect sweet treat !

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: In collaboration with the Élysée - Presidency of the Republic brand, Chocolat Alain Ducasse pays homage to the famous French symbol by creating the Little Rooster. This indulgent creation is filled with sweetness, featuring a smooth blend of hazelnut and French almond praliné mixed with our dark or milk chocolate blends. Proceeds contribute to the funding of the renovation of the Élysée Palace, helping to enhance this historic monument and open it to the French population, 300 years after its construction.

title: Cocoa Pods Bar 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Our Christmas Milk chocolate bar, featuring a unique blend highlighting various cocoa origins will take you back to the source of chocolate. Indulge in our chocolate bar adorned with cocoa pods, a true symbol of our foundational ingredient.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: To triumph during this historic sporting event, our Paris Manufacture transforms the Iron Lady into chocolate for victory! To help her cross the finish line, the 75% dark chocolate Triumph Bar is adorned with french hazelnuts and almonds, carefully selected by our chef. Whether as a gift or a treat for yourself, this crunchy, delicious recipe promises an exquisite tasting experience! Taste this ode to French know-how that crowns the efforts of our craftsmen.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: With its medal-like shape, the Praliné Triumph Hexagon transports you to this french based sporting event. Containing a treasure trove of French pistachio and almond praliné , it invites you to take part in this very special moment. If you want to reach the end and win the chocolate laurels, dare to enjoy it! Whether as a gift or for yourself, this 75% Dark Chocolate creation from our Manufacture promises a tasting experience full of flavor.

Whether as a gift or a treat for yourself, this crunchy, delicious recipe promises an exquisite tasting experience! Taste this ode to French know-how that crowns the efforts of our craftsmen.

title: Large
description: Our Soveria candied fruits, roc's, and dragées are gathered in one box! This box of Essentials contains milk & dark chocolate roc's, Soveria Candied Oranges, milk chocolate hazelnut dragées, dark chocolate almond dragées.

title: Large
description: Our Soveria candied fruits, roc's, and dragées are gathered in one box! This box of Essentials contains milk chocolate roc's, Soveria Candied Oranges and milk chocolate hazelnut dragées.

title: Soveria candied Citrus trio 75% Dark Chocolate
description: It is in Soveria, a small village in Corsica, that craftsmen manufacture oranges, lemons, grapefruit and ginger. After a night's rest they are then individually cut, before being coated with cocoa powder, with the exception of candied ginger.  The final step exalts their natural flavours: a thin coating of dark chocolate... For a very delicious and delectable result.

title: Soveria candied Oranges 75% Dark Chocolate
description: It is in Soveria, a small village in Corsica, that craftsmen manufacture oranges, lemons, grapefruit and ginger. After a night's rest they are then individually cut, before being coated with cocoa powder, with the exception of candied ginger.  The final step exalts their natural flavours: a thin coating of dark chocolate... For a very delicious and delectable result.

title: Soveria candied Ginger 75% Dark Chocolate
description: It is in Soveria, a small village in Corsica, that craftsmen manufacture oranges, lemons, grapefruit and ginger. After a night's rest they are then individually cut, before being coated with cocoa powder, with the exception of candied ginger.  The final step exalts their natural flavours: a thin coating of dark chocolate... For a very delicious and delectable result.

title: Large
description: Deliciously regressive, spreadable chocolate... Created from an almond and hazelnut praline, dark chocolate and milk chocolate, this spread will put a smile on the faces of children and grown-ups alike. Similarly to the Manufacture’s old-fashioned pralines, the spread has a slightly granulose texture making it unique and ultra- delicious. XL size 550g

title: Children's chocolate spread 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Our chocolate spread has been reinvented with an even creamier texture for little gourmets and their enjoyment! Made with almond and hazelnut pralinés , dark chocolate and milk chocolate, our smooth spread will delight the taste buds of young and old alike . You cannot go wrong, this creation is a must-have gift for children, so come and discover it in-store or on our website!

title: Hot Chocolate mix
description: A taste of childhood... A comforting brew whose smell is rich with memories, perfect for breakfast or an afternoon snack. How do you make a real cup of traditional hot chocolate? Pour a little warm milk over the grated chocolate to melt it, mixing well until it is smooth. Then add more warm milk, until the desired chocolaty consistency and strength is reached. 300g

title: Roc's  - Hazelnut 45% Milk Chocolate
description: A “Roc” is delicious and highly addictive: a blend of dried and candied fruits, puffed cereals and shavings of lace crêpes all coated in either dark or milk chocolate . Unique combinations, high-quality ingredients and an artisanal savoir-faire that results in no two Roc’s having the same shape, but all having a delicious taste that is constant!

title: Roc's - Almond 75% Dark Chocolate
description: A “Roc” is delicious and highly addictive: a blend of dried and candied fruits, puffed cereals and shavings of lace crêpes all coated in either dark or milk chocolate . Unique combinations, high-quality ingredients and an artisanal savoir-faire that results in no two Roc’s having the same shape, but all having a delicious taste that is constant!

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Dragées perpetuate the long-standing, classic recipe of caramelised dry fruit coated in chocolate . They are available in both dark and milk chocolate: almond and hazelnut.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Dragées perpetuate the long-standing, classic recipe of caramelised dry fruit coated in chocolate . They are available in both dark and milk chocolate: almond and hazelnut.

description: Dragées perpetuate the long-standing, classic recipe of caramelised dry fruit coated in chocolate . They are available in both dark and milk chocolate: almond and hazelnut.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Dragées perpetuate the long-standing, classic recipe of caramelised dry fruit coated in chocolate . They are available in both dark and milk chocolate: almond and hazelnut.

title: Jungle gourmet bar 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Generous proportions, a delicious recipe and a re-sealable pouch... the Chocobar is THE perfect treat to carry with you anywhere, in your bag or pocket. Your children will want to bite into this wonderfully indulgent bar. A hazelnut praline lies within including whole hazelnuts, covered with a thin layer of caramel, all wrapped in milk chocolate. It's the ideal chocolate for children ! Treat your little gourmets to a mouth-watering encounter with the animals of the jungle, thanks to the Manufacture Alain Ducasse!

title: Chocobar - Dark 75% Dark Chocolate
description: Generous proportions, geometric shapes that have become the Manufacture de chocolate signature, a delicious recipe and a re-sealable pouch... the chocolate bar is THE perfect treat to carry with you anywhere, in your pocket, to indulge anytime, anywhere... The "mendiant" style bar reveals a heart made with almond and hazelnut praline, slivers of pistachios, raisins and candied orange peel...

title: Sesame Chocobar 75% Dark Chocolate
description: Generous proportions, geometric shapes that have become the Manufacture's signature, a delicious recipe in a re-sealable pouch... the chocobar is THE perfect treat to carry in your pocket, to indulge anytime, anywhere... The bar reveals a heart made with black sesame and almond praline, puffed rice for the crispy, all coated in dark chocolate...

title: Chocobar - Milk 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Generous proportions, geometric shapes that have become the Manufacture de chocolat signature, a delicious recipe and a re-sealable pouch... the perfect treat to carry with you anywhere, in your pocket, to indulge anytime, anywhere... The "mendiant" style bar reveals a heart made with almond and cornflake praline combined with a caramel ganache, covered in Madagascar 45% milk chocolate.

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: In dark chocolate praline or milk chocolate. Individual bars of chocolate to enjoy on the go or slipped into a piece of bread. This compact and practical box is easily transportable, for an impromptu snack, a picnic, at the office, traveling... 20 individually wrapped bars - 240 g

title: Large
description: A childish delight, chocolate spread... Made with caramelised almonds and hazelnuts pralines, dark chocolate and milk chocolate, this spread will delight young and old alike. Like the traditional caramelised nut praliné made by La Manufacture, this spread has a delicately crunchy texture that makes it truly original as well as truly delicious.

title: Croc' 75% Dark & 45% Milk Chocolate
description: Revisit your childhood with our Croc'. These puffed cereals are carefully coated in dark or milk chocolate, creating a crunchy texture that melts deliciously in the mouth. Our Croc' is the perfect snack or afternoon treat!

title: 45% Milk Chocolate
description: In dark chocolate praline or milk chocolate. Individual bars of chocolate to enjoy on the go or slipped into a piece of bread. This compact and practical box is easily transportable, for an impromptu snack, a picnic, at the office, traveling... 20 individually wrapped bars - 240 g

title: Espresso - Coffee beans 50% Brazil, 50% India Signature Coffee
description: It can be drunk long or short, but above all it thinks big: our Signature Espresso Blend in beans is a journey between India and Brazil through fair, balanced aromatic paths. Taking the scenic route, this specialty coffee leads you to its fruity, spicy flavors and citrus and chocolate notes. A blend of great precision, thanks in particular to the two farms chosen: one committed to quality in the world's largest coffee-producing country, the other believing in a culture that welcomes what the earth gives it, without human intervention or added products.

title: The Italian - Coffee beans 100% Brazil Coffee Blend
description: When we think of Italian coffee, we think of it as intense & full-bodied , a little burnt, a little bitter. And that's exactly how we wanted ours. In beans, its powerful yet balanced chocolate and spice notes enchant you with a "ciao" and never leave you feeling low. Consistent right down to its origins, its 100% Brazilian blend combines two varieties, 80% Catuaï and 20% Conillon, from the same farm and the same plot of land, with the aim of highlighting a single terroir.

title: Ethiopia - Coffee beans 100% Ethiopia Yirgacheffe Cru d'Exception Coffee
description: Sit down at the counter and embark on a journey around the world and through history . These fine & subtle notes , these citrus, apricot and jasmine flavors, this strong but controlled acidity , are the bewitching promise of a return to the roots. We're heading for Ethiopia, the cradle of coffee for centuries, to the Yirgacheffe region , which produces some of the world's best-loved coffees. No doubt the plants feel at home in their native land, in a highly favorable environment, allowing them to flourish in the best possible way. Our head roaster really fell in love with this coffee chosen from all the coffees offered by the farm we work with, and we hope you will too. It's not everyday you get invited to travel aboard a cup !

title: Colombia - Coffee beans 100% Colombia Castillo Cru d'Exception Coffee
description: A coffee whose taste is inextricably linked to its origins. Welcome to La Fabrica, a Colombian farm in the Tolima region! It's here, on these high-altitude plots draped in mist and clouds, that a community of coffee growers comprising over 200 families cultivates Castillo , a variety that owes its unique characteristics to the country's particular climate. Here, each fruit is hand-picked, cherry by cherry. And cherry on top (of the coffee), a second selection is made after harvesting, to ensure that only the very best is kept ! The fruit is then fermented with natural yeasts before being dried and milled. The result of this demanding, natural method? Full-bodied, smooth and creamy flavors , with incredible complexity and fruity notes of mirabelle plum, red berries and physalis, thanks to the cherry’s sugar absorbed by the bean during all these stages. Prepare as an espresso for greater intensity, or as a filter for greater lightness, you’re the one calling the coffee shots!

title: The Filter - Coffee beans 25% Ethiopia, 50% Rwanda, 25% Kenya Signature Coffee
description: Filter coffee or philter coffee? It’s hard to tell as its smoothness goes straight to your heart ! There's something magical about this elixir, if only because of its history: it takes you on a journey to Africa, the cradle of coffee. A mythical journey, from Ethiopia to Rwanda via Kenya . The roaster, too, is a bit of a magician, disappearing into the background to make room for the taste of the product and its origins. He chooses a gentle, light roasting to bring out the natural sweetness and acidity of the fruit. An ode to the raw material and the land from which it comes.

title: The Paradox - Decaf coffee beans 100% Colombia Decaf Coffee
description: Of course we've thought of you, you paradoxical spirits who want to drink coffee without drinking coffee ! We're offering you the quite extraordinary experience of enjoying a smooth, singular beverage , caffeine-free, but with flavors wonderfully in line with what you'd expect from coffee, fair and balanced , with just the right amount of bitterness and acidity. And we didn't do things by halves just because you're a bit fussy. We went all the way to Colombia , and even climbed up to La Fabrica, a Colombian farm in the Tolima region. It's up there, on these high-altitude plots , draped in mist and clouds, that a community of coffee growers, comprising over 200 families, cultivates coffee with great care . Each fruit is hand-picked, cherry by cherry. And cherry on top (of the coffee), a second selection is made after harvesting, to ensure that only the very best is kept! The fruit is then fermented with natural yeasts before being dried, milled and decaffeinated. And there you have it! These beans can be prepared as an espresso for greater intensity, or as a filter for more lightness: it's time for a decaf break !

title: The Paradox - 15 decaf coffee capsules 100% Peru Decaf Coffee
description: Of course we've thought of you, you paradoxical spirits who want to drink coffee without drinking coffee ! We're offering you the quite extraordinary experience of enjoying a smooth, singular beverage , caffeine-free, but with flavors wonderfully in line with what you'd expect from coffee, fair and balanced, with just the right amount of bitterness and acidity. These capsules (compatible with Nespresso® machines) can be prepared as an espresso for greater intensity, or as a filter for more lightness: it's time for a decaf break !

title: Espresso - 15 coffee capsules 50% Brazil, 50% India Signature Coffee
description: It can be drunk long or short , but above all it thinks big: our Signature Espresso Blend in capsules (compatible with Nespresso® machines) is a journey between India and Brazil through fair, balanced aromatic paths. Taking the scenic route, it leads you to its f ruity, spicy flavors and citrus and chocolate notes. A blend of great precision, thanks in particular to the two farms chosen: one committed to quality in the world's largest coffee-producing country, the other believing in a culture that welcomes what the earth gives it, without human intervention or added products.

title: The Italian - 15 coffee capsules 100% Brazil Coffee Blend
description: When we think of Italian coffee, we think of it as intense & full-bodied , a little burnt, a little bitter. And that's exactly how we wanted ours. In capsules (compatible with Nespresso® machines), its powerful yet balanced chocolate and spice notes enchant you with a "ciao" and never leave you feeling low. Consistent right down to its origins, its 100% Brazilian blend combines two varieties, 80% Catuaï and 20% Conillon , from the same farm and the same plot of land, with the aim of highlighting a single terroir .
